name: Yakuza Kiwami 2 - Clan Creator Bundle
detailed_description:
Pre-Purchase Offer


About the Game

The ultimate Clan Creator bundle for Yakuza Kiwami 2! This bundle includes ALL the DLC from the console version, including the super, super rare (SSR) Clan Creator Leaders and Packs as well as two exclusive weapons, the Kiwami Machine Gun and the Kiwami Demon Blade!

Retrieve the Clan Creator Leader cards from a delivery box inside New Serena or Aoi.

Kazuma Kiryu Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
Kiryu's unique skill “Dragon of Dojima” summons lighting and deals major stun damage to enemies in the surrounding area.

Ryuji Goda Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
Goda's unique skill “Dragon of Kansai” summons a tornado of fire to deal major burn damage to enemies in the surrounding area.

Kaoru Sayama Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
Sayama's unique skill “Yakuza Hunter” will increase attack and defense for all units for 45 seconds.

Shun Akiyama Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
Akiyama's unique skill “True Essence of Sprinting” will increase all allies speed for 45 seconds.

Osamu Kashiwagi Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
Kashiwagi's unique skill “Essence of Iron Heart” will greatly raise the defensive power for all allies for 15 seconds.

The Florist of Sai Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
The Florist's unique skill “True Essence of Repair” will repair durability for all equipment by 30%.

Kiryu Clan Creator Pack
Adds three characters from Yakuza 6's Kiryu Clan to the roster for the Majima Construction Clan Creator minigame.

Onomichi Clan Creator Pack
Adds three characters from Yakuza 6's Onomichi to the roster for the Majima Construction Clan Creator minigame.

JUSTIS Clan Creator Pack
Adds three characters from the Yakuza 6 JUSTIS gang to the roster for the Majima Construction Clan Creator minigame.

Also includes the following cards:
• Goro Majima Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
• Taiga Saejima Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
• Daigo Dojima Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
• Makoto Date Clan Creator Leader (SSR)
• Wataru Kurahashi Clan Creator Card (SR)
• Jiro Kawara Clan Creator Card (SR)
• Tsutomo Bessho Clan Creator Card (SR)
• Ryo Takashima Clan Creator Card (SR)
• Hostess Ono Michiyo
• Sotaro Komaki R Clan Card
• Jo Amon R Clan Card

Also includes the following weapons:
• Kiwami Machine Gun
• Kiwami Demon Blade
• Demonfire Blade
• Cursed Tonfa
• Thunder Dagger
• Rocket Launcher
• Illegally Modded Police Baton

Also includes the following outfits:
• The Comedian Suit
• Black Suit (Kiryu’s Tux)
• Pajamas (Kiryu in sweat pants)
• Majima Construction Helmet
• Golden Suit

Also includes the following items:
• Majima’s Maji Bun (5,600 recovery, 560 XP of each color)
• Rainbow Bun (500 XP to each skill category)
• 1 Million Yen
• 300 President Majima Awards

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 7 (64-Bit Required)
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, 3.1 GHz
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 图形: GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB / Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • 附注事项: Pre-set Graphics Setting: Low, Target FPS: 30FPS (1080p at 75% render scale)
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 10 (64-Bit Required)
  • 处理器: Intel Core i7-6700, 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 1700, 3.7 GHz
  • 内存: 16 GB RAM
  • 图形: GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB / Radeon RX Vega 56, 8GB
  • 附注事项: Pre-set Graphics Setting: High, Target FPS: 60FPS @1080p
